channel.title: Changing the exp rate of npcs?

hey, where is the thing where you can change how much exp you get when hitting a npc :confused:
thanks -fatcat-[br][size=1]Posted on: June 19, 2007, 12:26:49 PM[/size][hr]does anyone know!?
